sentences.sentence: Your IRA deduction cannot be taken from unearned income.
sentences.translation: 你的个人退休账户的扣税不可能从非劳动收入中减去。

sentences.sentence: Miss Allan beamed at him. "You are clever to guess. I'm sure I don't know how you did it."—"Deduction," James said.
sentences.translation: 阿伦小姐对他笑道：“你很会猜， 我确实不知道你怎么办到的。”——杰姆斯说：“推论。”

sentences.sentence: It was a pretty astute deduction.
sentences.translation: 那是个非常精明的结论。
